pageContext.claim: “Undercover Huber is a great spoof, funny, but at the same time sad, because the real @JohnWHuber did absolutely NOTHING. He was a garbage disposal unit for important documents & then, tap, tap, tap, just drag it along & run out of time. A.G. Jeff Sessions was played like a drum!”
pageContext.analysis: Trump is complaining that the Justice Department did not find illegality in the Clinton Foundation. He's referring to John Huber, a U.S. attorney who served in the Obama administration, offered to resign when Trump took office, was renominated by Trump, and tasked by then-Attorney General Jeff Sessions to review the Justice Department's investigation into Clinton. Huber "found nothing worth pursuing," as The Post reported.
